Description.Name: Shinji Okada
Description.Details: Shinji Okada, operating under the callsign "Mantis" is a skilled and enigmatic MechWarrior known for her stealthy tactics and strategic prowess. Her combat style is calculated precision, striking swiftly and moving fast before her adversaries can react. With a background shrouded in covert expertise, Shinji deftly navigates the chaos of the battlefield, employing her tactical ingenuity to outmaneuver opponents and seize pivotal moments. "Mantis" Okada is a formidable presence that can't be underestimated.
